"Citizen: A new government policy to incentivize the growth of local ecosystems."
"Social Impact Investing: A new government policy to promote social responsibility in business practices."
"Green Energy Incentives: A new government policy to encourage the use of renewable energy sources."
"Education Reform: A new government policy to provide equal access to quality education for all."
"Community Development: A new government policy to invest in the development of local communities and promote social cohesion."
